PHRASE.LANG: Wearing your underwear on the outside is considered an act of rebellion. [#Legal]
Exhiber ses sous-vêtements est une marque de rébellion. [#Legal]
Das Tragen von Unterwäsche über der Hose gilt als Akt der Rebellion. [#Legal]
Indossare la biancheria intima a vista è considerato un gesto di ribellione. [#Legal]
Llevar la ropa interior a la vista es un acto de rebeldía. [#Legal]
Wearing your underwear over your pants is considered an act of rebellion. [#Legal]
